page.title: 17Asquith Motor Co.,Gt.Yeldham
page.content: The Asquith Motor Carriage Co.Ltd. was formed in 1982 and is now owned by the Hunnable Group of companies and is sited on the Gt. Yeldham industrial estate.They make replica vintage vans and mini-coaches from new Ford Transit vans.The design is based on a 1920's model Talbot.It takes six weeks to complete a vehicle and output is about three a fortnight.The vehicles,which are only made to order, cost from Â£14,500 and have been sold all over Europe.The actual body is made from fibre glass and alluminium. Brass fitments are used on more expensive versions. The Transit chassis is lengthened before the hand-finished body on an ash frame is fitted.Seats are covered to the buyer's specificat- ion and a signwriter inscribes the customer's name on the body in beautiful lettering.
